TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SelectionItemPattern extends System.Windows.Automation.BasePattern

Docs.summary: Represents selectable child items of container controls that support .

remarks.format: ## Remarks See [Control Pattern Mapping for UI Automation Clients](~/docs/framework/ui-automation/control-pattern-mapping-for-ui-automation-clients.md) for examples of controls that can implement this control pattern.

Docs.related: UI Automation Control Patterns for Clients

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void AddToSelection() cil managed

Docs.summary: Adds the current element to the collection of selected items.

remarks.format:
## Examples The following example shows how to add an element to the collection of currently selected items.
[!code-csharp[UIASelectionItemPattern_snip#103](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIASelectionItemPattern_snip/CSharp/UIASelectionItemPattern_snippets.cs#103)] [!code-vb[UIASelectionItemPattern_snip#103](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIASelectionItemPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIASelectionItemPattern_snippets.vb#103)] [!code-csharp[UIASelectionItemPattern_snip#104](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIASelectionItemPattern_snip/CSharp/UIASelectionItemPattern_snippets.cs#104)] [!code-vb[UIASelectionItemPattern_snip#104](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIASelectionItemPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIASelectionItemPattern_snippets.vb#104)]

Docs.exception: An attempt is made to add a selection to a single-selection container where = and another element is already selected.

Docs.summary: Gets the cached property values for this .

remarks.format:
## Remarks Cached property values must have been previously requested using a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest>. To get the current value of a property, get the property by using <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPattern.Current%2A>.
For information on the properties available and their use, see <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPattern.SelectionItemPatternInformation>.

Docs.exception: The requested property is not in the cache.

Docs.summary: Gets the current property values for this .

remarks.format:
## Remarks This pattern must be from an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> with an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode.Full> reference in order to get current values. If the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> was obtained using <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode.None>, it contains only cached data, and attempting to get the current value of any property raises an exception. Use <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPattern.Cached%2A> to get the cached value of a property that was previously specified using a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest>.
For information on the properties available and their use, see <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPattern.SelectionItemPatternInformation>.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.Automation.AutomationEvent ElementAddedToSelectionEvent
Public Shared ReadOnly ElementAddedToSelectionEvent As AutomationEvent

Docs.summary: Identifies the event raised when an item is added to a collection of selected items.

remarks.format:
## Remarks If the result of an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPattern.AddToSelection%2A> call is a single selected item, then an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPattern.ElementSelectedEvent> will be raised instead.
This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications. UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPatternIdentifiers>.
## Examples In the following example, event listeners are declared for the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPattern> events.
[!code-csharp[UIASelectionItemPattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIASelectionItemPattern_snip/CSharp/UIASelectionItemPattern_snippets.cs#101)] [!code-vb[UIASelectionItemPattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIASelectionItemPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIASelectionItemPattern_snippets.vb#101)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.Automation.AutomationEvent ElementRemovedFromSelectionEvent
Public Shared ReadOnly ElementRemovedFromSelectionEvent As AutomationEvent

Docs.summary: Identifies the event raised when an item is removed from a collection of selected items.

remarks.format:
## Remarks If the result of a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPattern.RemoveFromSelection%2A> call is a single selected item, then an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPattern.ElementSelectedEvent> will be raised instead.
This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications. UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPatternIdentifiers>.
## Examples In the following example, event listeners are declared for the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPattern> events.
[!code-csharp[UIASelectionItemPattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIASelectionItemPattern_snip/CSharp/UIASelectionItemPattern_snippets.cs#101)] [!code-vb[UIASelectionItemPattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIASelectionItemPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIASelectionItemPattern_snippets.vb#101)]

Docs.summary: Identifies the event that is raised when a call to any of , , or results in a single item being selected.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications. UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPatternIdentifiers>.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly IsSelectedProperty As AutomationProperty

remarks.format:
## Remarks This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications. UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPatternIdentifiers>.
## Examples In the following example, a root element is passed to a function that returns a collection of [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] elements that are descendants of the root and satisfy a set of property conditions.
[!code-csharp[UIASelectionItemPattern_snip#100](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIASelectionItemPattern_snip/CSharp/UIASelectionItemPattern_snippets.cs#100)] [!code-vb[UIASelectionItemPattern_snip#100](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIASelectionItemPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIASelectionItemPattern_snippets.vb#100)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Pattern As AutomationPattern

remarks.format:
## Remarks This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications. UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPatternIdentifiers>.
The pattern identifier is passed to methods such as <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPattern%2A> to retrieve the control pattern of interest from the specified <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>.
## Examples In the following example, a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPattern> control pattern is obtained from an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>.
[!code-csharp[UIASelectionItemPattern_snip#102](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIASelectionItemPattern_snip/CSharp/UIASelectionItemPattern_snippets.cs#102)] [!code-vb[UIASelectionItemPattern_snip#102](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIASelectionItemPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIASelectionItemPattern_snippets.vb#102)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void RemoveFromSelection() cil managed

Docs.summary: Removes the current element from the collection of selected items.

remarks.format:
## Examples The following example shows how to remove an element from the collection of currently selected items.
[!code-csharp[UIASelectionItemPattern_snip#103](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIASelectionItemPattern_snip/CSharp/UIASelectionItemPattern_snippets.cs#103)] [!code-vb[UIASelectionItemPattern_snip#103](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIASelectionItemPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIASelectionItemPattern_snippets.vb#103)] [!code-csharp[UIASelectionItemPattern_snip#105](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIASelectionItemPattern_snip/CSharp/UIASelectionItemPattern_snippets.cs#105)] [!code-vb[UIASelectionItemPattern_snip#105](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIASelectionItemPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIASelectionItemPattern_snippets.vb#105)]

Docs.exception: An attempt is made to remove a selection from a selection container where one item is selected and = .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Select() cil managed

Docs.summary: Deselects any selected items and then selects the current element.

remarks.format:
## Examples The following example shows how to select an item in a container by specifying the text of the item.
[!code-csharp[UIASelectionItemPattern_snip#106](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIASelectionItemPattern_snip/CSharp/UIASelectionItemPattern_snippets.cs#106)] [!code-vb[UIASelectionItemPattern_snip#106](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIASelectionItemPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIASelectionItemPattern_snippets.vb#106)]

remarks.format:
## Remarks This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications. UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPatternIdentifiers>.
